TitlePage.Title: AutoDoc
TitlePage.Subtitle: Generate documentation from &GAP; source code

TitlePage.Abstract: &AutoDoc; is a &GAP; package whose purpose is to aid &GAP; package authors in creating and maintaining the documentation of their packages.
